name: Spicy's Pizza: Delivery Demo
description:
Have you ever wanted to deliver pizzas, in a video game? I f you have, then you're in luck, because this is the game for you! Run through 2 wonderful worlds and deliver pizzas to various customers. But it's not just delivery... sometimes you'll have to find the ingredients to make a pizza, or even pick up some sodas!

Disclaimer: this game is in early-access and is just a demo as of now, if you find any glitches, please report them in the comments.
